Token.Abstract: Various utility methods in support of cryptographic operations.
Creates a random string of bytes (based on arc4random() generation) and returns them as an NSData object.

Parameter.Name: lengthInBytes
Parameter.Abstract: The number of bytes to generate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string of random bytes, as an NSData object.

Token.Abstract: Creates a PBKDF2 derived key from an input key (string), using default values for the random-generated salt data and its length, the number of derivation rounds, and the derived key length.

Parameter.Name: stringToHash
Parameter.Abstract: The plaintext string used to generate the key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SFPBKDFData object representing the derived key.

Token.Abstract: Creates a PBKDF2 derived key from an input key (string), a salt, number of derivation rounds, and desired derived key length.

Parameter.Name: stringToHash
Parameter.Abstract: The base string to use for the derived key.

Parameter.Name: salt
Parameter.Abstract: The salt to append to the string.

Parameter.Name: numDerivationRounds
Parameter.Abstract: The number of derivation rounds used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: derivedKeyLength
Parameter.Abstract: The desired derived key length.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SFPBKDFData object representing the derived key.

Token.Abstract: Encrypt the given data using the AES-128 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to encrypt.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The encryption key used to encrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the encryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The encrypted data, or nil if encryption was not successful.

Token.Abstract: Decrypt the given data using the AES-128 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to decrypt.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The decryption key used to decrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the decryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The decrypted data, or nil if decryption was not successful.

Token.Abstract: Encrypt the given data using the AES-256 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to encrypt.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The encryption key used to encrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the encryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The encrypted data, or nil if encryption was not successful.

Token.Abstract: Decrypt the given data using the AES-256 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to decrypt.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The decryption key used to decrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the decryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The decrypted data, or nil if decryption was not successful.

Token.Abstract: Create asymmetric keys (public/private key pairs) using RSA algorithm with given keyName and length

Parameter.Name: keyName
Parameter.Abstract: The name string used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The key length used for key

Token.Abstract: Get RSA public key as NSString with given keyName and length

Parameter.Name: keyName
Parameter.Abstract: The name string used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The key length used for key

ReturnValue.Abstract: The key string, or nil if no matching key is found

Token.Abstract: Get RSA private key as NSData with given keyName and length

Parameter.Name: keyName
Parameter.Abstract: The name string used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The key length used for key

ReturnValue.Abstract: The key data, or nil if no matching key is found

Token.Abstract: Get RSA public SecKeyRef with given keyName and length

Parameter.Name: keyName
Parameter.Abstract: The name string used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The key length used for key

ReturnValue.Abstract: The SecKeyRef, or nil if no matching key is found

Token.Abstract: Get RSA private SecKeyRef with given keyName and length

Parameter.Name: keyName
Parameter.Abstract: The name string used to generate the key.

Parameter.Name: length
Parameter.Abstract: The key length used for key

ReturnValue.Abstract: The SecKeyRef, or nil if no matching key is found

Token.Abstract: Encrypt data with givien SecKeyRef using RSA pkcs1 algorithm

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to encrypt

Parameter.Name: keyRef
Parameter.Abstract: The keyref used in encryption

ReturnValue.Abstract: The encrypted Dataa, or nil if encryption failed

Token.Abstract: Decrypt data with givien SecKeyRef using RSA pkcs1 algorithm

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: The data to decypt

Parameter.Name: keyRef
Parameter.Abstract: The keyref used in decryption

ReturnValue.Abstract: The decypted Data, or nil if decryption failed
